title: The Next Big Thing
description: Everybody's looking for the Next Big Thing, but no-one needs it more than Tierney Marshall. Cool hunter and trend spotter, she's got one week to find the sassiest ad campaign ever. Or risk losing her promised promotion - not to mention her designer date - to her arch rival. But when she accidentally falls into the trend spotter's spotlight, she discovers that being the next big thing, is the last thing she needs. And that comfort can be found in the arms of the last man she'd expect...
author: Sara Caspian
